channel.title: Rune-Village We give you the 2006-2008 old fun back!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2czdlw7.jpg[/img] [b]Welcome to see the Rune-Village project.[/b]
[u][b]This is meaned to be re-make of 2006-2008 runescape.[/b][/u]
[b]If you would like to see more updates, information, pictures and videos you can register to our forums which is now done. WEBSITE: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com[/b]
Comleted projects:
Skillcapes and skillcape emotes. Dragonfireshield which uses special randomly. Report abuse in game works. We will read them! ALL skills, also farming and firemaking needs more fixing. Pest Control minigame which is working real way. 2600 Spawns, more coming and every1 on real spot. (Took 1 week to write). Perfect quest system, also we got now Desert Treasure quest now working, when you complete you can use ancients magiks. Probably the best Clanchat. Warriors guild. Quick switching like in 2006-2008. Wilderness! Skillcape masters in real locations, gives you mastery cape when you reach 99 skill. Most of spawns are in real locations! Npc clipping and player clipping. Most of NPC:s are using correct animations. Dwarf Cannon. Minigames. Quests. Obsidian maul + berserker necklace = Legit powers Ranging works perfectly, quick switching and ofcourse perfect magic casting! Slayer helmet effects. More of course, it isn't easy to remember everything. Bosses now added: King Black Dragon, Chaos Elemental, Daggannoth kings Jad which gives you firecape, you must complete all the 63 waves to get it. It's working 100% without bugs. Kalphite queen. More coming of course! Perfect woodcutting with tree spirits, and your axe can be broked by a tree Ent! Mining with rock golems REAL ROCK CRABS, you must walk near to rock to get your rock crab!
Coming: More monsters bosses. Travelling (Almost done) Real fishing, i mean with that a fish can come and take your Fishing net, Lobster pot etc... Dragonfire shield charging
[b]*This is updated in 24 hours* I will update this soon, this just shows you what im working with right now. When beta version is released no one will not lose his account. Check this page everyday because we will give out soon beta keys. If you do not have one, you can't beta test it.[/b] If you would like to see more pictures and features please, visit our website at: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com [Media] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2nipeh5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/pavjk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/29egco2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2jc9ger.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/dew4cy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2vmsnsl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2exmtex.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/fepj86.jpg[/img] [b]If you would like to see more pictures and features please, visit our website at: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com[/b] Serverbase: Blank hyperion.

item.title: Rune-Village We give you the 2006-2008 old fun back!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Why did you use the new emote icons with an old gameframe? It really clashes. Did you fix the memory leak in Hyperion?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Village We give you the 2006-2008 old fun back!
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Village Rune-Village
item.description:
@Rune-Village wrote:

2czdlw7.jpg1039×187

Welcome to see the Rune-Village project.

This is meaned to be re-make of 2006-2008 runescape.

If you would like to see more updates, information, pictures and videos you can register to our forums which is now done.
WEBSITE: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com

Comleted projects:

Skillcapes and skillcape emotes.
Dragonfireshield which uses special randomly.
Report abuse in game works. We will read them!
ALL skills, also farming and firemaking needs more fixing.
Pest Control minigame which is working real way.
2600 Spawns, more coming and every1 on real spot. (Took 1 week to write).
Perfect quest system, also we got now Desert Treasure quest now working, when you complete you can use ancients magiks.
Probably the best Clanchat.
Warriors guild.
Quick switching like in 2006-2008.
Wilderness!
Skillcape masters in real locations, gives you mastery cape when you reach 99 skill.
Most of spawns are in real locations!
Npc clipping and player clipping.
Most of NPC:s are using correct animations.
Dwarf Cannon.
Minigames.
Quests.
Obsidian maul + berserker necklace = Legit powers
Ranging works perfectly, quick switching and ofcourse perfect magic casting!
Slayer helmet effects.
More of course, it isn’t easy to remember everything.
Bosses now added:
King Black Dragon,
Chaos Elemental,
Daggannoth kings
Jad which gives you firecape, you must complete all the 63 waves to get it. It’s working 100% without bugs.
Kalphite queen.
More coming of course!
Perfect woodcutting with tree spirits, and your axe can be broked by a tree Ent!
Mining with rock golems
REAL ROCK CRABS, you must walk near to rock to get your rock crab!

Coming:
More monsters bosses.
Travelling (Almost done)
Real fishing, i mean with that a fish can come and take your Fishing net, Lobster pot etc…
Dragonfire shield charging

This is updated in 24 hours
I will update this soon, this just shows you what im working with right now.
When beta version is released no one will not lose his account. Check this page everyday because we will give out soon beta keys. If you do not have one, you can’t beta test it.
If you would like to see more pictures and features please, visit our website at: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com
[Media]

2nipeh5.jpg768×504



2jc9ger.jpg766×503

dew4cy.jpg761×506

2vmsnsl.jpg768×503



If you would like to see more pictures and features please, visit our website at: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com
Serverbase: Blank hyperion.
